#summary Screenshots of the HUD with cropping to prevent excessive bandwidth and page space usage.

=Introduction=
Click for full-screen. Magenta text is generally indicator for last-damage-dealt. Non-cropped version can be found [http://code.google.com/p/gmang-tf2hud/wiki/ScreenshotsFull here].

==Menus==
First is main menu, second is team menu, third is class menu. Models are animated and hotkeys work.

==Scout==
The health and ammo appears that way for all classes. Bonk Energy Drink and Crit-A-Cola have color zones to indicate when the item's effect will wear off. Green = effect active, red = effect expired.

[http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/3976/gmanghudscreennewbonkfu.png http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/143/gmanghudscreennewbonkcr.png]

==Soldier==
Shows basic health, ammo, and ctf layouts.

[http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/8388/gmanghudscreensoldierfu.png http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/6205/gmanghudscreensoldiercr.png]

==Demoman==
Top is regular loadout, bottom is sword+shield loadout. Chargin' Targe charge meter notches indicate crit status: past orange notches is minicrit, past red notches is crit. Yellow text is decapitated heads.

[http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/3041/gmanghudscreenstickiesf.png http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/4472/gmanghudscreenstickiesc.png]

[http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/5951/gmanghudscreentargefull.png http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/9852/gmanghudscreentargecrop.png]

Engineer HUD is more condensed and detailed (currently no build/destroy menus).

Top is uncharged Uber. Bottom is activated Uber. Also shows targetID's.

[http://img522.imageshack.us/img522/2428/gmanghudscreenmedicfull.png http://img517.imageshack.us/img517/5910/gmanghudscreenmediccrop.png]

===Sniper=
Huntsman chargeup has indicator notches for headshot damage values. Orange zone = 175+ damage on headshot, green = 200+, purple = 260+, grey = 300+.

[http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/4201/gmanghudscreensniperful.png http://img375.imageshack.us/img375/6134/gmanghudscreensnipercro.png]

==Spy==
Spy donning a disguise. Cloak meter is ItemEffectMeter, which means it's shared with things like Sandman, Jarate, and Buff Banner charge. Disguise portrait is only visible as depicted if class images are turned on.

[http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/3457/gmanghudscreenspynewful.png http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/8356/gmanghudscreenspynewcro.png]

==Pyro/Heavy==
Pyro and Heavy are basically identical. Also shows flag hold screen.

[http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/2888/gmanghudscreenheavyfull.png http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/9514/gmanghudscreenheavycrop.png]
